tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
#Government Tender Announcement
##Project Title
Enclosed Cargo Trailer

##Project Description
The Department of National Defence is soliciting quotations for the supply of Enclosed Cargo Trailers and related items. This notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of 15 calendar days.

##Project Overview
This solicitation is open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. To become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996

##Key Information
* **Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)**: E60HP-19TRLR
* **Supply Arrangement (SA)**: E60HP-19TRLR
* **CPI Classification**: *N2330B (Trailer, Cargo Van)
* **Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Canadian Commercial Corporation (CCC) ID**: PW-22-01010037
* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-236661/A
* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-07T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date**: TBA

##Tender Information
* **Tender Status**: Expired (Appel Offres Statut: Expiré)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Categorie Approvisionnement: Biens et services)
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (Accord sur les marchés publics de l’Organisation mondiale du commerce)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: World (Regiones de Opportunity: Monde)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada (Regiones of Delivery: Canada)

##Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Shepstone, Victor
* **Contact Email**: victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 819-939-3040
